data.name: US UNITED : CO-OP DECKBUILDER
data.detailed_description:
US UNITED is a rogue-lite coop deck-building game where heroes need to WORK AS A TEAM! Set off on a quick single player run or play cooperatively with friends both online and locally.

Choose your cards wisely! More than 500 upgradeable cards and 150+ relics will let you create a range of different builds.

Pick from a variety of heroes to form your party. Each hero has their own cards, relics, strengths and weaknesses.

No hero can stand alone. Use one hero's defense to build up another's buff. Control other heroes' decks. Boost one hero, nerf an enemy, then switch positions and deliver a killing blow. Only if you work as a team, can you succeed.

Melee attack monsters in your lane or use ranged attacks and skills to support other heroes. OR Use your magic to move allies and foes into more favorable positions!
Similarly influence initiative and thus turn order - Stack Stunning attacks and make an enemy skip a turn completely!

Strategically draw on extra actions, but suffer later OR pass your turn, but gain additional actions ever on. A whole additional layer to strategize with.


At launch US UNITED will feature:
  • 6+ characters with their own set of cards
  • 500+ different cards
  • 150+ different relics
  • 40+ unique combat encounters
  • co-op multiplayer both locally and online with up to 3 players

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E4300 (2 * 1800) / AMD Athlon Dual Core 4450e (2 * 2300) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 GTX (768 MB) / Intel HD 4600 / Radeon HD 3850 (512 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 x64
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4570T (2* 2900) / AMD FX-
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750 Ti (2048 MB) / Radeon HD 7850 (2048 MB)
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.10.5 Yosemite or higher
  • Processor: M1
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 750M (1024 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OSX 10.10.5 Yosemite or higher
  • Processor: M2
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M390 (2048 MB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
